channel.title: Confidence Interval on Datumorphism

item.title: Confidence Interval
item.description: We will use upper cases for the abstract variable and lower cases for the actual numbers. Why is Confidence Interval Needed? Suppose I sample the population multiple times, the mean value $\mu_i$ of the sample is calculated for each sample. It is a good question to ask how different these $\mu_i$ are compared to the true mean $\mu_p$ of the population. In this article, we would need to specify several notations. $X$ is the quantity we are measuring. $\bar X$ is the mean of the quantity $X$. Confidence Interval This theorem states that the probability for the true mean $\mu_p$ to fall into a specific range can be calculated using
